SA20n1309:2: samāsataḥ samādhivaśitāprāptasya samādhivaśitāsanniśrayeṇocchāmātrāt sarvārthasamṛddhiḥ karmaṇyacittasya suparibhāvitacittasyāryaḥ prabhāva ityucyate |
SA20n1309:3: dharmāṇāñca yā mahāphalatā mahānuśaṃsatā sā teṣāṃ prabhāva ityucyate |
SA20n1309:4: pūrvaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāropacayād buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca sahajā āścaryādbhutadharmatā |
SA20n1309:6: sa khalveṣa prakārabhedena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidho bhavati |
SA20n1309:7: abhijñāprabhāvo dharmaprabhāvaḥ sahajaśca prabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaśca śrāvaka pratyekabudvairasādhāraṇaśca taiḥ |
SA20n1309:8: tatra ṣaḍbhijñāḥ-ṛddhiviṣayo divyaṃ śrotraṃcetasaḥ paryāyaḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiścyutyupapādadarśanamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā ca abhijñāprabhāva ityucyate |
SA20n1309:9: tatra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ-dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca dharmā ityucyante |
SA20n1309:10: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo'nubhāvaḥ sa dharmaprabhāva ityucyate |
SA20n1309:16: tadyathā kampanaṃ jvalanaṃ spharaṇaṃ vidarśanamanyathībhāvakaraṇaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ prathanaṃ sarvarūpakāyapraveśanaṃ sabhāgatopasaṃkrāntirāvirbhāvastirobhāvaḥ vaśitvakaraṇaṃ pararddhayabhibhavanaṃ pratibhānadānaṃ smṛtidānaṃ sukhadānaṃ raśmipramokṣaśca ityevaṃbhāgīyā ṛddhi pāriṇāmikītyucyate |
SA20n1309:18: iha tathāgataḥ samādhivaśitāprāpto vā karmaṇyacitto vā bodhisattvo vihāramapi kampayati |
SA20n1309:19: gṛhamapi grāmanagarakṣetramapi narakalokamapi tiryaglokamapi pretalokamapi manuṣyalokamapi devalokamapi cāturdvīpakamapi sāhasrikamapi lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasrikamapi trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātuṃ trisāhasraśatamapi sahasramapi śatasahasramapi yāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān trisāhasramahāsāhasrān lokadhātūn kampayati |
SA20n1309:27: sarvakāyena prajvalitasya vividhā arciṣaḥ kāyānnirgacchanti nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikavarṇāḥ |
SA20n1309:29: yathāpi tadgṛhamapyābhayā spharati vihāramapi pūrvavadyāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyām lokadhātūnābhayā spharati pūrvavattadyathā kampane |
SA20n1309:31: yathā sukhopaniṣaṇṇādyāgatāyāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇaśrāvakabodhisattvadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā apāyānapi vidarśayatyadhaḥ |
SA20n1309:34: teṣu ca buddhabodhisattvān yāvadgaṅgānadībālukāsamānyapi buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya yena nāmnā saṃśabditaṃ bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ tatra ca buddhakṣetre yannāmako bhavati tathāgataḥ tacca buddhakṣetraṃ darśayati tañca tathāgatam |
SA20n1309:35: tacca nāma vyapadiśati tasya buddhakṣetrasya tathāgatasya ca |
SA20n1309:36: tato'pyarvāgvidarśaṃyati vyapadiśati tato'pi pareṇa yatkāmaṃ yāvatkāmam |
SA20n1309:38: sa cet pṛthivīmapo'dhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā |
SA20n1309:39: tejo vāyumadhimucyate tadapi tathaiva bhavati nānyathā |
SA20n1309:46: yathā mahābhūteṣvanyonyapariṇāme nānyathībhāvakriyā evaṃ rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu veditavyam |
SA20n1309:49: himavantaṃ vā parvatarājamādiṃ kṛtvā sarvaparvatān suvarṇaṃmadhimucyate |
SA20n1309:53: tadubhayavivarjitānāṃ suvarṇatāṃ vā durvarṇatāṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā |
SA20n1309:54: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā]'dhimucyate |
SA20n1309:57: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati pratyāgacchati ca yāvadakaniṣṭhādūrdhvaṃ tiryagvā punaryāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasrān lokadhātūn gacchati āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena |
SA20n1309:58: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca |
SA20n1309:63: mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-] parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati |
SA20n1309:64: sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |
SA20n1309:67: upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya |
SA20n1309:71: yamapi te'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so'rthaṃ na mantrayate |
SA20n1309:72: uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā'ntarddhīyate |
SA20n1309:73: antarhitañcainaṃ na prajānanti ko'nveṣo'ntarhito devo vā manuṣyo veti |
SA20n1309:74: yathā kṣatriyapariṣadamevaṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatiśramaṇapariṣadaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikān devān trayastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartino devānevaṃ brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitānmahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān |
SA20n1309:76: mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate |
SA20n1309:79: yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati |
SA20n1309:80: sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati |
SA20n1309:86: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ savaṣāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavati |
SA20n1309:87: tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti |
SA20n1309:93: ye'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham |
SA20n1309:96: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhayati |
SA20n1309:97: ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati |
SA20n1309:98: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu |
SA20n1309:99: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti |
SA20n1309:100: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1309:101: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate |
SA20n1309:108: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte |
SA20n1309:112: tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte |
SA20n1309:113: tatpunarātmasabhāgamanekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ devanāga-[yakṣā] suragaruḍakinnaramahoragavarṇa manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam |
SA20n1309:114: sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte |
SA20n1309:117: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1309:121: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ |
SA20n1309:122: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā'nuvartata eva |
SA20n1309:123: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1309:129: asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca |
SA20n1309:131: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ |
SA20n1309:132: paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā |
SA20n1309:134: ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye'pi dūre ya'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ |
SA20n1309:136: dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati |
SA20n1309:139: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati |
SA20n1309:140: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati |
SA20n1309:141: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt |
SA20n1309:142: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham |
SA20n1309:143: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya |
SA20n1309:145: samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam |
SA20n1309:148: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati |
SA20n1309:149: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharati |
SA20n1309:151: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā ātmanaivātmanastāvatpūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati |
SA20n1309:152: yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati |
SA20n1309:154: ye'pi te sattvakāyāḥ pūrvānte yannivāsā stānapyātmanā smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa |
SA20n1309:155: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme |
SA20n1309:156: sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam |
SA20n1309:159: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati |
SA20n1309:160: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam |
SA20n1309:161: evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ |
SA20n1309:162: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati itivṛttakāṃśca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktān sattvānāṃ karmaphalavipākamārabhya |
SA20n1309:163: śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ śāśvatavādināmekatya-śāśvatikānāṃ vā |
SA20n1309:165: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti |
SA20n1309:166: tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām |
SA20n1309:167: sa cetpareṇābhogaṃ na karoti atha karoti tato'pi pareṇānyeṣūrdhvaṃ lokadhātuṣu śṛṇoti |
SA20n1309:171: ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca |
SA20n1309:173: tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca |
SA20n1309:174: tathā'saṃkliṣṭacittānāmuddeśaḥ svādhyāyo viniścayaḥ samyak codanā smāraṇāvavādānuśāsanī iti yadvā punaranyadapi kiñcit subhāṣitaṃ sulapitamarthopasaṃhitam |
SA20n1309:177: ye sattvānāṃ mṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārūṣyasaṃbhinnapralāpaśabdā adho vā'pāyopapannānāmūrdhvaṃ vā devopapannānāṃ tiryagvā manuṣyeṣūpapannānām |
SA20n1309:179: ye mahāsattvasaṃghaśabdā vā vividhairvā kāraṇaiḥ kāryamāṇānāmārttasvaraṃ kandamānānāṃ vikrośatāṃ vā meghastanitaśabdā vā śaṃkhabherīpaṭahaśabdā vā |
SA20n1309:190: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu |
SA20n1309:192: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān |
SA20n1309:195: yadrūpaṃ nirmitaṃ yacca divyamacchaṃ rūpamadho yāvadavīcimūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanam |
SA20n1309:196: sa cedadha ūrdhvaṃ vānyeṣu lokadhātuṣu rūpadarśanamārabhyābhogaṃ karoti tiryagyāvadaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvaṃ rūpagataṃ paśyati |
SA20n1309:197: antatasteṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tāṃstāṃstathāgatān vicitreṣu mahatsu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu niṣaṇṇān dharma deśayataḥ paśyati |
SA20n1309:198: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate |
SA20n1309:199: divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate |
SA20n1309:200: evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti |
SA20n1309:202: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti |
SA20n1309:203: vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti |
SA20n1309:204: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti |
SA20n1309:207: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām |
SA20n1309:208: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām |
SA20n1309:210: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1309:211: ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1309:212: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya |
SA20n1309:215: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1309:216: prāpto mayā parairvā āsravakṣayo na veti |
SA20n1309:221: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti |
SA20n1309:223: ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti |
SA20n1309:225: na ca saṃkliśyata iti so'sya sarvaprabhāvāṇāṃ mahattamaḥ prabhāvo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1309:226: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante |
SA20n1309:231: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ |
SA20n1309:233: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti |
SA20n1309:240: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ |
SA20n1309:241: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti |
SA20n1309:244: dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ |
SA20n1309:255: ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti |
SA20n1309:259: ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ |
SA20n1309:260: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti |
SA20n1309:263: ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti |
SA20n1309:264: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati |
SA20n1309:270: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti |
SA20n1309:271: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ sanniśrayabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya dhyānam |
SA20n1309:276: ityeṣa caturākāro dhyānaprabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ |
SA20n1309:279: dānenāpi priyavāditayāpyarthacaryayāpi samānārthatayāpi ca sattvān paripācayati |
SA20n1309:281: sarvatra nyāyopadeśena dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca hitasukhābhyāṃ sattvānapyanugṛhṇāti |
SA20n1309:292: tribhiśca sthānaistuṣitopapannānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ deva putrāṇāmabhibhavaḥ divyenāyuṣā divyena varṇena divyena yaśasā |
SA20n1309:293: upapadyamānasya ca mātuḥ kukṣāvudāreṇāvabhāsena lokadhātuspharaṇaṃ saṃprajānataśca mātuḥ kukṣipraveśaḥ sthānaṃ nirgamo janma ca |
SA20n1309:297: carame ca bhave paścime janmani sarvapratyarthikairmārānīkairapi sarvopakramaiścābādhyatā |
SA20n1309:302: svayañcānācārya kamekākina eva ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre mahābodherabhisaṃbodhaḥ |
SA20n1309:303: brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā svayamupasaṃkramya loke saddharmadeśanāyai adhyeṣaṇā |
SA20n1309:306: bodhisattve ca mṛgapakṣiṇāmapyantataḥ kṣudramṛgāṇāmapi paramā viśvāsyatā |
SA20n1309:308: tiraścāmantikāttathāgatasya pūjā tadyathā markaṭo madhvaneḍakaṃ tathāgatāyānupradattavān |
SA20n1309:309: pratigṛhīte ca tasmin bhagavatā sa markaṭo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ pratyavasṛṣṭaḥ sa nṛtyamānaḥ |
SA20n1309:310: bhagavantamevoddiśya tathāgataḥ snāsyati taṃ snāpayiṣyāmīti meghapratīkṣaṇā |
SA20n1309:311: vṛkṣamūle ca bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya vā santiṣṭhatastasya sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ prācīnanimnāsu chāyāsu tasya vṛkṣasya chāyayā kāyāvijahanatā |
SA20n1309:314: smṛtasya ca pratisaṃviditānāṃ vedanānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vitarkāṇāmutpādaḥ sthānaṃ nirodhaśca |
SA20n1309:317: tadyathā unmattāḥ kṣiptacittāḥ tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā svacittaṃ pratilabhante |
SA20n1309:320: raktānāṃ rāgaparyavasthānāṃ vigacchati dviṣṭānāṃ dveṣaparyavasthānaṃ mūḍhānāṃ mohaparyavasthānam |
SA20n1309:338: na cāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati yāvad dvitīyamālopaṃ prakṣipati |
SA20n1309:340: parinirvāṇasamaye ca mahāpṛthivīcāla ulkāpātā diśo dāhā antarikṣe devadundubhīnāmabhinadanam |
SA20n1309:341: so'pi sahaja eva tathāgatānāṃ prabhāvo nābhijñāsaṃskṛtaḥ |
SA20n1309:347: iha tathāgato bodhisattvo vā'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyena prabhāvopāyena yathā'rthakriyā bhavati tadyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
SA20n1309:349: sarvaprakāreṇa cābhijñāprabhāveṇa dharmaprabhāveṇa sahajena prabhāveṇa samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1309:353: śrāvakasya tu saha sattvadhātunā dvisāhasro lokadhāturabhijñāviṣayaḥ |
SA20n1309:356: tathā hi te ekasyaivātmano damāya pratipannāḥ |
SA20n1309:359: etānākārān sthāpayitvā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tadanyaḥ prabhāvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sādhāraṇo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1309:360: tadevaṃ sati śrāvakapratyekabuddhā eva tāvadbuddhabodhisattvaiḥ saha na tulyābhijñā bhavanti |
SA20n1309:362: yaścāpi prātihāryaprabhāvo buddhabodhisattvānāmṛddhyādeśanānuśāsti-saṃgṛhītaḥ so'pyabhijñāprabhāva eva yathāyogaṃ praviṣṭo veditavyaḥ ṛddhiviṣayacetasaḥ paryāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñāprabhāveṣu |
